Digital Photo Gallery is a next generation online image management system.

FEATURES

* Upload in full resolution
* Manage thousands of images
* Access your files anywhere
* Create unlimited image versions
* Automate sharpening, sizing and compression
* View image usage across the internet
* Read and write metadata
* Visualise EXIF data
* Geotagging
* Built-in blogging platform
* Create custom websites

You need an account to use this application.

https://accounts.digitalphotogallery.com/register
